section.title: Description
section.p: This Role identifies a Person to whom the originating Person is related in some way.

stentry.p: The date range during which this person is a contact party for the patient.
"The start date of the contact role." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-8.
"The end date of the contact role." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-9.
"The period during which this contact person or organization is valid to be contacted relating to this patient." - HL7 FHIR, Patient.contact.period.
Indicates how the target Person is related to the person identified in the owning Person class. Examples include Spouse, Child, Parent, Legal Guardian, etc.
"The actual personal relationship that the next of kin/associated party has to the patient." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-3. See HL7 Table 63 for suggested values.
A pointer to a Person who is acting in the Role of a Related Person.
